long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Search Anything and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Bing.

Every time you open a new tab, it will have a different random wallpaper.

By accessing and/or using the website, you signify your agreement to accept this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any or all of the following terms of the privacy policy, please do not access and/or use the website. Providing information to us is your choice. You understand that any data, information or content that you submit or upload to the Website shall be visible to other users of the website and will be stored on company’s servers for the purposes of making the website available to you. Please do not post, submit or upload to the website any data or content which would include any information that you do not wish to be made available to the company.
